languages.text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g}, а атака не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}периода восстановления{/g}.

traits.locale_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель, получившая попадание, выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −10. В случае провала цель оказывается оглушена, а атака не требует периода восстановления.
Цель, получившая попадание, выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −10. В случае провала цель оказывается оглушена, а атака не требует периода восстановления.

languages.text: 使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态。若目标未能通过检定，则此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}立刻重置。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态。若目标未能通过检定，则此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}立刻重置。

languages.text: この武器で攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは −10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を実施するか、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格できない場合、この攻撃には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}がない。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を実施するか、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。ターゲットが判定に合格できない場合、同攻撃には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は適用されない。

languages.text: Si se acierta un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} con esta arma, el objetivo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}. Si el objetivo falla la prueba, este ataque no tendrá tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si se acierta un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} con esta arma, el objetivo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}. Si el objetivo falla la prueba, este ataque no tendrá {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g}.

languages.text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 bestehen, sonst wird es {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}. Misslingt die Probe, hat dieser Angriff keine {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 bestehen, sonst wird es {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}. Falls das Ziel bei der Probe scheitert, hat dieser Angriff keine {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}.

languages.text: Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} infligé avec cette arme, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}. Si la cible échoue au test, aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} ne s'applique à cette attaque.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Après un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} porté à l'aide de cette arme, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}. Si la cible échoue au test, aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} ne s'applique à cette attaque.

languages.text: Bu silahla başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşta{/g} hedef, −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}. Hedef, testi geçemezse saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} gerektirmez.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
